Literature.Title: Identification of antimicrobial peptides from teleosts and anurans in expressed sequence tag databases using conserved signal sequences.
Literature.Author: Tessera V, Guida F, Jureti? D, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:13% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=1.2±0.2µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(IC50=1.5±0.05µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-WaaP(IC50=1.4±0.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(IC50=7.8±0.7µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(IC50=1.2±0.3µM)
